summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Montague  is a census-designated place and unincorporated community in Montague County, Texas, United States. It is the county seat of Montague County and had an estimated population of 400 in 2000, according to the Handbook of Texas.
^ http://www.texastripper.com/pronounce/locations-m.html
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07. 
^ "Montague, Texas". The Handbook of Texas online. Retrieved 2009-03-29.
title: Montague, Texas
